T09D4153:197b-1: lo ka a'a nanda n'a ta ka n'a ma /
T09D4153:197b-3: 'jig rten kun du dga' ba'i zlos gar zhes bya ba /
T09D4153:197b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T09D4153:197b-5: bung ba'i phreng ba mi gsal sgra sgrogs rkang pa 'dab ma rnam bskyod pas //
T09D4153:197b-6: ge sar kha 'bus ro bcud dang bcas rdul phran tshogs pas khyab gyur cing //
T09D4153:197b-7: sbrang rtsi rgya chen thig les rnam khengs me tog thal mo sbyar ba 'dis //
T09D4153:197b-8: bdag gis rgyal ba'i zhabs la mchod pas khyed rnams la ni zhi bar mdzod //
T09D4153:197b-9: gzhan yang byams pa'i thugs ni rgya chen dga' bas mgul nas yang dag 'khyud gyur pa //
T09D4153:197b-10: khyed kyi snying rjes bdag cag kyang ni de bzhin btang snyoms mtshungs mdzad rigs //
T09D4153:197b-11: legs pa'i lha mo grags 'dzin mdzad bzhin bdag cag gis ni rjes mi 'gro //
T09D4153:197b-12: bdud kyi bu mos phrag dog gis smras khyed rnams
T09D4153:197b-13: sangs rgyas rtogs par shog / rdzogs byang chub la
T09D4153:197b-14: bdud ni khro bas skad cig gzhu bkang de yi
T09D4153:197b-15: sde tshan rnams // gang gis rnam par bros pas
T09D4153:197b-16: bub cing log 'dren zhabs kyis mnan te mngon skad
T09D4153:197b-17: sde tshan rnams // 'byin // lus med bu mo
T09D4153:197b-18: myos byed ma rnams mchi 'dzag 'chi med rnams kyis
T09D4153:197b-19: sde tshan rnams // 'byin // mthong nas dga' //
T09D4153:197b-20: stobs bcu mnga' ba'i sngon 'gro gzhan gyis mi thub
T09D4153:197b-21: mas ni khyed rnams skyod bar shog / dga' byed
T09D4153:197b-22: kyis mchod pa'i mtha' las mdo 'dzin pa'o //
T09D4153:197b-23: snyan ngag tsan dr'a d'a sha y'a //
T09D4153:197b-24: zlos gar 'jig rten kun du dga' //
T09D4153:197b-25: sngon med zlos gar rab sbyar bas //
T09D4153:197b-26: de ring tshogs la bdag gis ston //
T09D4153:197b-27: de ni nges par snyan ngag nyid //
T09D4153:197b-28: shar phyogs dz'a tu kar na'i rigs las ni //
T09D4153:197b-29: lha mo rgyal ma yid kyi shing rta las //
T09D4153:197b-30: gang 'khrungs khur ni 'khur bar mi nus kyang//
T09D4153:197b-31: de yi bu zhes rab tu grags pa thob //
T09D4153:197b-32: gzhan yang rab 'byam rgyan dang bcas shing tshigs bcad rkyang pa mkhas pa'i 'jug dogs rgya chen rnams //
T09D4153:197b-33: gang gis dngos po gcig gi brjod byas la yang rgya chen zad par mi 'gyur dang //
T09D4153:197b-34: gang gis by'a kar na ni nyung zhing rab gsal yongs rdzogs gzhan yang mdzad gyur nas //
T09D4153:197b-35: 'jig rten chags dang 'jig rten mun pa'i tshogs chen rab tu 'joms mdzad gyur //
T09D4153:197b-36: de nas da ni rol cha dang bcas te rtsom
T09D4153:197b-37: pa na re zhig rang gi 'phags ma la bos
T09D4153:197b-38: te kye 'phags ma re zhig 'dir byon ces so
T09D4153:197b-39: // de nas de ni gdung ba'i shugs dang bcas te rab tu zhugs nas /
T09D4153:198a-1: bdag 'ongs sa bka' bsgos shig ces so //
T09D4153:198a-2: mdo 'dzin pa nas kye 'phags ma ci'i phyir khyod sdug bsngal bar byed /
T09D4153:198a-3: zlos gar ma nas ci'i phyir sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur te /
T09D4153:198a-4: ji ltar khyod kyi ming tsam gyis kyang ni //
T09D4153:198a-5: gnas rnams yang dag 'dren nus bu gcig po //
T09D4153:198a-6: nges par bdag ni rab tu byung nas ni //
T09D4153:198a-7: rang lus 'bras bcas bsgrub par bya zhes smra //
T09D4153:198a-9: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no //
T09D4153:198a-12: de byang chub sems dpa' ma yin nam mkha' las kyang ma lhung zhing //
T09D4153:198a-13: rnam par 'dzin byed kyi mthil brtol nas kyang ma byung ngo //
T09D4153:198a-15: gang zhig 'dir snying rje skye bo'i phyir 'tsho bar
T09D4153:198a-16: spro ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod
T09D4153:198a-19: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ni //
T09D4153:198a-20: snying rje'i sa bon las skyes pa'i //
T09D4153:198a-21: byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'khrungs //
T09D4153:198a-22: pha rol phyin pa'i yal 'dab rgyas //
T09D4153:198a-23: dpag bsam shing bzhin dgos 'dod rnams //
T09D4153:198a-24: sdug bsngal ba des chog go //
T09D4153:198a-25: 'di'i bsod nams gyi stobs las de bzhin du dpal du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T09D4153:198a-26: yang dag pa'i rol mo rtsom par mdzod cig dang /
T09D4153:198a-29: 'dir yang dus gang la brten yang dag pa'i rol mo brtsam par bgyi /
T09D4153:198a-31: kye 'phags ma 'dir re zhig gsar du mngon par
T09D4153:198a-32: 'byung ba lhan cig byed pa'i snying ma'i dris yongs
T09D4153:198a-33: su khyab pa me tog gi phreng ba len pa
T09D4153:198a-34: sbrang rtsi byed pa'i rigs kun du dga' zhing rtse
T09D4153:198a-35: ba me tog gi dus la brten la glu long
T09D4153:198a-37: pad mo rnams ni ba mos rigs nyams 'od ldan gang zhig shar nas dbugs rnams 'byin //
T09D4153:198a-38: de bzhin mkhas pa'i lho phyogs rlung rnams kyis ni 'jig rten yang dag tshim par byed //
T09D4153:198a-39: phyogs rnam pa l'a sh'a yi ljon shing me tog sha dral bzhin du shin tu dmar //
T09D4153:198a-40: bsil zer 'od zer 'gro ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bzhin gsal pos yang dag gnas //
T09D4153:198a-41: yol ba'i nang nas ngo mtshar che'o ngo mtshar che zhes so //
T09D4153:198a-47: rig 'dzin ma yis gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu 'di mthong nas /
T09D4153:198b-0: rab dga' g-yo @198b zhing rang gi lag pa'i padma gar rtse zhing //
T09D4153:198b-1: nam mkhar rkang gdub rtse la gos kyi 'od zer reg gyur nas //
T09D4153:198b-2: gangs ldan ri bo'i rtse mo la ni rab tu rgyu bar byed //
T09D4153:198b-3: bdag cag rnams kyang ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par brtsam mo zhes zer nas /
T09D4153:198b-4: gnyis po nges par zhugs te /
T09D4153:198b-5: mngon du phyogs nas gnas so //
T09D4153:198b-6: de nas rig 'dzin ma rab tu zhugs te /
T09D4153:198b-7: gar byed cing aa tstshi t'a aam aatstshi r'a aam /
T09D4153:198b-8: gang gis skye bo 'di 'dra sa chen steng //
T09D4153:198b-9: lha rnams kyis kyang shin tu mthong bar dka' //
T09D4153:198b-10: rab tu dga' bas gzhan gyi dbang gyur pa //
T09D4153:198b-11: dga' ba'i grogs mo padma ba t'i la //
T09D4153:198b-12: bdag gi khur ni yang dag gtad byas nas //
T09D4153:198b-13: nam zhig 'ong bar gyur te bdag mi shes //
T09D4153:198b-14: zhes nas yongs su zhugs so //
T09D4153:198b-15: gang gis 'ongs pa dang 'dug pa'ang mi dran par
T09D4153:198b-16: dga' ba'i grogs mo'i bsti gnas su phyin te bdag
T09D4153:198b-17: nyid ngo mtshar che nas rab tu zhugs so //
T09D4153:198b-18: 'dir ji ltar sbrang rtsi byed pa'i rkang pa'i khur
T09D4153:198b-19: gyis me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i rdul gyi tshogs
T09D4153:198b-20: pas khyab pa'i rdo leb gyi steng n'a ga ge
T09D4153:198b-21: sar gyi srang lam du byas pa la dga' ba'i
T09D4153:198b-22: grogs mo padma ba t'i ni sbrang gi bu mo
T09D4153:198b-23: dang lhan cig tu gnas shing cung zad cung zad
T09D4153:198b-25: drung du nye bar nye bar 'ongs so //
T09D4153:198b-26: de nas sbrang gi bu mo dang padma can rab tu zhugs te /
T09D4153:198b-28: kye sbrang rtse'i bu mo bdag gi snying myos pa
T09D4153:198b-29: snyam byed do zhes dga' ba'i grogs mo rin chen
T09D4153:198b-30: phreng ba ma la lta bar byed cing /
T09D4153:198b-31: ci'i phyir na de tsam du yang mi 'ong bar gyur /
T09D4153:198b-32: rig 'dzin mas nye bar thos nas kye padma can sems gtor bar ma byed ces zer /
T09D4153:198b-33: 'dir de dag gnyis na re aa re dga'/
T09D4153:198b-34: aa re dga' zhes smra zhing gnyis po rtab rtab por langs song nas /
T09D4153:198b-35: aa ai ci yin ci yin rig 'dzin ma nas
T09D4153:198b-36: kun gyi lta byed rnams kyis blta bar 'os pa
T09D4153:198b-37: bdag gis mthong ste mig gis 'bras bu thob bo
T09D4153:198b-38: // gnyis po nas khyod kyis ci mthong smros shig
T09D4153:198b-39: / rig 'dzin la ni slar yang de nyid smra
T09D4153:198b-40: // bar byed do // gnyis pos yang 'dri zhing
T09D4153:198b-41: rig 'dzin ma la padma can rab tu 'khyud do
T09D4153:198b-42: // bar byed do // // bdag ni rab tu dga' ba'i gzhan dbang du gyur te /
T09D4153:198b-43: gal te bdag gis dbyangs can ma la bar rnyed na smra'o //
T09D4153:198b-45: khyod kyi dga' ba de shin tu lci mo zhig zhugs pa 'dra'o //
T09D4153:199a-0: rig 'dzin ma nas 'di ni gzhan mthong nas kyang de la dga' ba chen po @199a * //
T09D4153:199a-2: gnyis po nas bdag nyid gcig po 'gegs pas chog gam /
T09D4153:199a-3: bdag cag la yang cha shas legs par gos mdzod /
T09D4153:199a-5: bdag gis mthong ba dul ba'i mdangs ldan pa //
T09D4153:199a-6: 'od zer rab tu 'dren pa 'phro ba can //
T09D4153:199a-7: phyogs bzhi chos rnams ma lus sgyu rtsa la tshogs //
T09D4153:199a-8: yongs su zhugs rnams mig ni dga' bar byed //
T09D4153:199a-10: legs ldan ma zla ba 'am ci zhig / rig 'dzin ma khros te /
T09D4153:199a-11: de bzhin du bdag gis ma smras pa rang mchog go //
T09D4153:199a-12: kye 'di ni ri dags kyis mtshon te /
T09D4153:199a-13: de la mtshungs pa byed dam /
T09D4153:199a-16: rig 'dzin ma nas gang de'i sbyor ba dang bral
T09D4153:199a-17: na h'um zhes byed cing byin za'i rtse mo phye
T09D4153:199a-18: ma leb dang 'dra ba ni du ba'i mdangs dang
T09D4153:199a-19: ldan zhing mdzes par rab tu rkyong ngam /
T09D4153:199a-21: gang ji ltar yin pa smros dang /
T09D4153:199a-22: rig 'dzin ma nas bdag gis smra bar bya yis
T09D4153:199a-23: de legs par nyon cig /'di nas rig 'dzin ma
T09D4153:199a-24: skye bo'i gtam phan tshun smra ba las gzhon nu
T09D4153:199a-25: gtsug na nor bu 'di 'dra'o zhes thos pas ya
T09D4153:199a-26: mtshan che nas dga' ba dang lhan cig s'a ke
T09D4153:199a-27: ta'i grong khyer du bdag gis phyin no //
T09D4153:199a-28: de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyi lha mo 'od
T09D4153:199a-29: kyi blo gros ma la khye'u zhig yang dag par
T09D4153:199a-30: 'khrungs te / gzhan gyis bskran [*bskrun] par mi nus
T09D4153:199a-31: shing gzugs dang phun sum tshogs pas rnam par spras
T09D4153:199a-32: pa mchog gi snying rje can gang 'dod pa kun
T09D4153:199a-33: sbyin ba gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu zhes pa
T09D4153:199a-35: de yang mthong ban kun gyis mngon par 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa grub pa'o //
T09D4153:199a-36: rgyal po gang zhig gi bu mo'i ched du bu
T09D4153:199a-37: mo de'i sku gzugs dang dbyibs kyi bkod pa thang
T09D4153:199a-38: ka la ri mor bris te khyer ba la bar
T09D4153:199a-39: du rig 'dzin ma rnams kyis brkus te 'khyer bar
T09D4153:199a-40: byed do // gnyis po mngon par 'dod pa 'phel te /
T09D4153:199a-41: slar yang de gang na yod /
T09D4153:199a-45: khyod ni mkha' la 'gro ba 'bras bu dang bcas te 'thob bo //
T09D4153:199a-46: gang ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par 'dod
T09D4153:199a-47: pa yid 'phrog pa rnams khyod kyis gang bar thob
T09D4153:199a-49: kye ma rigs dang khyed cag gi yang mngon par
T09D4153:199a-50: 'dod par yongs su 'gyur gyis sbrang rtsi'i bu mo
T09D4153:199a-51: nas / gang las bdag cag la 'di'i skal pa sus ster bar byed /
T09D4153:199b-3: skyon gang yin smros shig rig 'dzin ma nas //
T09D4153:199b-4: gang gis na de khyim thab bya ba las phyir phyogs so //
T09D4153:199b-5: m'a dha b'i dang padma ba t'i dag nas 'jig
T09D4153:199b-6: rten yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni shin tu dkon
T09D4153:199b-7: no // bi dy'a dh'a r'i nas /
T09D4153:199b-8: bdag gis ngo mtshar che ba gzhan yang dran te /
T09D4153:199b-9: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gtam gyis yid bzhin gyi
T09D4153:199b-10: nor bu ni ji lta ba bzhin du de la
T09D4153:199b-11: lhan cig skyes pa'i gtsug na nor bu'o //
T09D4153:199b-12: m'a dha b'i nas aa tsi ram aam bidya dha ri nas ci'i phyir 'di ngo mtshar che /
T09D4153:199b-13: nam mkha'i spyod yul gyis skye bo de mthong ngam /
T09D4153:199b-15: bdag cag gis mthong ba'i thabs 'ga' zhig yod dam /
T09D4153:199b-16: bidya dha r'i nas ma yin te bdag gis khyer 'ongs so //
T09D4153:199b-17: gnyis po ngo tsha zhing rtab rtab bor phyogs rnams su blta zhing /
T09D4153:199b-18: de gang na gang na zhes so //
T09D4153:199b-19: rig 'dzin mas bdag gi stod gos kyi gseb nas /
T09D4153:199b-20: thang ka la ri mo bris pa de phyung nas bstan no //
T09D4153:199b-21: gnyis po ngo mtshar nas nges par bltas te /
T09D4153:199b-22: gnas tshul ni rin chen phreng ba ma'i phyogs 'dra ba zhig go //
T09D4153:199b-25: khyod kyis don med pa'i dga' ba 'phel bar byas te /
T09D4153:199b-26: khyod bzhin du legs pa'i nyams dang bcas so //
T09D4153:199b-27: grogs mo dga' ma bdag skyon ci mchis smros shig
T09D4153:199b-28: / padma can yun ring du nges par bltas nas
T09D4153:199b-32: padma can sbrang gi bu mos mthong nas sbrang gi bu mo nas /
T09D4153:199b-33: smra bar mi nus pa'o zhes zer /
T09D4153:199b-35: kye padma ba t'i gdung bar ma byed cig /
T09D4153:199b-36: khyod kyi yang bdag gis thang ka cig ri mor
T09D4153:199b-37: bris te lha mo 'od kyi blo gros ma la
T09D4153:199b-38: byin pa dang / nye bar bltas nas /
T09D4153:199b-39: de yang mngon par dga' nas 'di tsam zhig bag
T09D4153:199b-40: ma dang mna' ma'i gdong ba mthong nas zhes smra'o
T09D4153:199b-41: // 'dis lhan cig tu mna' ma byas nas shin tu spro'o zhes smra'o //
T09D4153:199b-43: dga' ba'i grogs mo de bzhin du sbyo bar rigs sam ;
T09D4153:199b-44: sbrang gi bu mo dga' nas de nas de nas zhes zer /
T09D4153:199b-46: de nas rgyal bo tshangs byin gyis mngon du mthong ngo //
T09D4153:199b-49: 'di ni gzhon nu rjes su rjes su 'ongs so //
T09D4153:199b-50: 'on kyang byed pa po'i dbang las so //
T09D4153:199b-51: de nas gnyis pos ri mo bris pa mngon du bltas nas /
T09D4153:200a-1: pa'i mi gzhon nu la ston du bcug go //
T09D4153:200a-2: de nas des yun ring du bltas nas /
T09D4153:200a-5: de'i mtshan nyid ni gang yin rig 'dzin ma nas /
T09D4153:200a-6: lci ba'i skye bo ni rjes su chags so zhes pa'o //
T09D4153:200a-7: padma ba t'i ni gang mnyan par bya ba mnyan nas ngus so //
T09D4153:200a-8: rig 'dzin ma ni des skrag nas //
T09D4153:200a-9: ji ltar bdag gi bdud rtsi'i char byin pas //
T09D4153:200a-10: dug gis rnam par khyab par gyur //
T09D4153:200a-11: de 'dis slar yang ji ltar bcos par bya //
T09D4153:200a-15: de rnams gcig tu 'dir su 'ong ngam snyam mo //
T09D4153:200a-16: de nas drang srong dpon slob gnyis rab tu zhugs so //
T09D4153:200a-18: bu'i rang bzhin mnyes gshin pa //
T09D4153:200a-19: yid gdung gang gis mi shes pa //
T09D4153:200a-20: de nyid gcig pu skyes bu ste //
T09D4153:200a-21: 'jig rten na ni bde mchog thob //
T09D4153:200a-23: bu mo padma can ma ba t'i me tog thur
T09D4153:200a-24: song ba las ci ste yun ring du 'gor ro
T09D4153:200a-25: // ci'i phyir khyab 'jug gis ni mtshon byed ma zhes stobs kyis khyer ram /
T09D4153:200a-26: tsha zer byed pas zla ba'i cha zhes mi bzod 'od kyis rang nyid rnam zhugs sam /
T09D4153:200a-27: yang na rig 'dzin thabs dang phrad nas rig 'dzin yin zhes phyag byas khyer gyur tam /
T09D4153:200a-29: sems 'di rang dbang med par yang dag rab tu myos par gyur /
T09D4153:200a-31: kye mkhan po de ltar sems gdung mi 'tshal /
T09D4153:200a-32: mkhan po'i mthu stobs ni sa gsum na sus kyang
T09D4153:200a-33: 'da' bar mi nus so zhes zer nas gnyis po
T09D4153:200a-35: drang srong gis phyogs rnams su bltas te /
T09D4153:200a-37: gal te bung ba'i rigs kyi lus ni rnam khebs zla rnams bral gyur nas //
T09D4153:200a-38: gdung bas zhugs shing tshang tshing gis sgrib khron pa rnams su lhung ba'am //
T09D4153:200a-39: yang na zla dang 'thabs pas de'i mi bzod brtse zhing rgyug pas lhung //
T09D4153:200a-40: yang na byis pa gcig pur du 'am bdag ni shin tu gdung bar byed //
T09D4153:200a-41: thams cad kyis mnyam du thos shing mthong nas rtab rtab por gyur nas /
T09D4153:200a-42: rig pa 'dzin ma nas yab yin nam ji ltar yin zhes zer ro //
T09D4153:200a-43: padma can dang sbrang gi bu mo dag ngo tsha
T09D4153:200a-44: dang bcas bzhin du bdag cag gis ji ltar smras
T09D4153:200a-45: pa yab kyis thos so zhes zer /
T09D4153:200a-46: padma ba t'i nas sbrang shing tshang tshing 'di'i nang
T09D4153:200a-47: du zhugs na yab kyis ma mthong ba phyir log
T09D4153:200a-48: pa srid dam snyam nas zhugs so //
T09D4153:200b-0: rig 'dzin ma @200b ni rtab rtab por nye bar btud de /
T09D4153:200b-5: bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma 'di ci yin zer /
T09D4153:200b-6: rig 'dzin ma ni skrag nas bdag ni nges par 'jigs pas na smra mi nus so //
T09D4153:200b-7: yab nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyis de bzhin du mngon du mdzod cig zer /
T09D4153:200b-8: drang srong gis bsam gtan bsgoms so //
T09D4153:200b-9: rig 'dzin ma ni shin tu 'jigs par gyur te /
T09D4153:200b-10: 'dir yab kyis ci smra'am snyam mo //
T09D4153:200b-11: drang srong nas bu mo 'jigs pa des chog go //
T09D4153:200b-12: kye 'di la ji lta ba de bzhin bdag dbang
T09D4153:200b-13: che'o zhes zer yang thams cad dga' ba dang bcas
T09D4153:200b-14: par gyur to // bdag cag rnams 'dis dbugs phyung snyam mo //
T09D4153:200b-16: sngon nas 'di yon tan phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni nye bar thos te //
T09D4153:200b-17: mngon par 'dod pa 'di ni mchog yin no //
T09D4153:200b-20: bdag cag rnams rjes su bzung ngo //
T09D4153:200b-23: the tshom des chog don rnams grub //
T09D4153:200b-24: yid kyi shing rta las byung ba'i //
T09D4153:200b-25: nges par dka' thub skye bo yi //
T09D4153:200b-29: re zhig ri mo las thob pa'ang mchod par 'os par bya'o zhes smra /
T09D4153:200b-30: rig 'dzin ma nas me tog blangs nas phul lo //
T09D4153:200b-31: drang srong gis de la phul te nges par bltas te /
T09D4153:200b-32: ae ma mkhas pa zhig gis bris so //
T09D4153:200b-34: yang dag gnas kyis rab dbye 'dug stangs lta tshul dang //
T09D4153:200b-35: phra sbom zug dang mtho dma' rtsig pa'i cha rnams dang //
T09D4153:200b-36: zhib tshags rnam dag mig ni rab tu g-yo ba 'dra //
T09D4153:200b-37: ya mtshan ri mo dag ni nges par smra ba bzhin //
T09D4153:200b-38: ae ma bdag gi bu mo ni yid kyi shing rta rab tu dga' bar chags so //
T09D4153:200b-40: bdag nyid chen po de nyid ni //
T09D4153:200b-41: yul rnams la ni kha phyir phyogs //
T09D4153:200b-42: gang gis de phyir gus pa yis //
T09D4153:200b-44: bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma yang khyod kyi
T09D4153:200b-45: grogs mo dga' ma dag gang na yod shes sam
T09D4153:200b-47: legs ldan khyod nyid mthong nas tshang tshing gi khang ba 'dir zhugs so //
T09D4153:200b-49: padma ba t'i khyod kyis ji ltar ngo tsha yang bslabs sam /
T09D4153:200b-50: bu padma can 'dir shog / padma can ni ngo tsha bas 'dar zhing /
T09D4153:201a-3: yid ches sems ni the tshom med par lta byed cing //
T09D4153:201a-4: lus ni rnam par g-yo med brtan zhing bkur 'dod med //
T09D4153:201a-5: byis pa'i blo gros ji bzhin khyod kyis rab dgar 'gyur //
T09D4153:201a-6: rang bzhin gyis mdzes brtan ma ci'i phyir 'di ngo tsha //
T09D4153:201a-7: padma ba t'i ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T09D4153:201a-8: drang srong ni spyi bo la nye bar gtugs te
T09D4153:201a-9: mngon par 'dod pa slar thob par gyur cig ces
T09D4153:201a-10: zer / rig 'dzin ma gang gi skye bor gnas
T09D4153:201a-11: pas kye dga' ba'i grogs mo byed pa po yin
T09D4153:201a-12: zer / no // gzhan du legs ldan gyis dbyangs ci'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur /
T09D4153:201a-13: bdag kyang don 'di la de bzhin du mngon par chags so //
T09D4153:201a-14: drang srong slob ma bram ze nas kye mkhan po myur du mdzod /
T09D4153:201a-15: rig byed kyi dus tshod la song ngo //
T09D4153:201a-17: ji ltar nyi ma gung gi dus la nye bar 'ong ngam /
T09D4153:201a-19: da ni rab shing gi gri bam rnams la rig 'dzin rnams bsnyel bso'i mtha'/
T09D4153:201a-20: ljon pa'i bsil grib 'og tu ri dags rnams ni skyug ldad byed cing gnas pa dang /
T09D4153:201a-21: btsugs shing yur chu rnams nyal zhing gnas pa dang /
T09D4153:201a-22: btsugs yu 'gro med rtse mo rnams la lha yi sreg rdzas rnams kyi du ba yang dag 'khrigs //
T09D4153:201a-23: dpal ldan chags bral bsod nams mchog gi mngon brjod pa //
T09D4153:201a-24: ma lus sa stengs grags pas 'gro ba gcig nyid rgyal //
T09D4153:201a-25: gang zhig zlos gar rang dbang nor gyis rab dga'i gar //
T09D4153:201a-26: dpal ldan tsandra go mi'i snyan ngag len zhing gnas //
T09D4153:201a-27: 'dir thams cad nges par zhugs so //
T09D4153:201a-28: yan lag dang po rdzogs so /
T09D4153:201a-30: // / de nas snga 'jug ma rab tu zhugs te /
T09D4153:201a-31: 'dir ni rgyal rigs lha'i 'jig rten 'dra bar mthong//
T09D4153:201a-32: ri mo'i bag ma'ang bag ma'i ltad mo 'di bzhin na //
T09D4153:201a-33: gal te 'di ni bden pa yin na ji ltar 'gyur //
T09D4153:201a-34: de ci gzhan du 'di ni sngon med mthong bar
T09D4153:201a-35: 'gyur zhes zer nas yongs su blta zhing zhugs so
T09D4153:201a-36: // rgyal phran grong mtha'i shin tu mdzes ma rnams //
T09D4153:201a-37: 'di rnams 'dir ni de bzhin rnam par spras //
T09D4153:201a-38: rgyan gyi 'od zer 'di bzhin 'phro ba yis /
T09D4153:201a-39: grong bar rnam khengs gos dmar gar byed bzhin //
T09D4153:201a-40: de nas ji ltar dga' ba'i grogs mo lo ma
T09D4153:201a-41: can gyis mthong nas nges par bltas shing 'dir lo
T09D4153:201a-42: ma can dang / de bzhin du gar byed cing 'ongs so //
T09D4153:201a-43: de nas lo ma can rab tu zhugs te /
T09D4153:201a-44: kye kun da khyod nyon cig gsung /
T09D4153:201b-0: @201b 'di bzhen du bag ma'i ltad mol btang snyoms su byed pa ci yin /
T09D4153:201b-1: kun ta li ka nas kye hanya dze lo ma
T09D4153:201b-2: can lha mos ni bag ma ltad mor byas mod
T09D4153:201b-3: kyi / 'on kyang gzhon nu 'dir slar 'jug gam /
T09D4153:201b-4: de nas bdag gis yid phyir mi ldog par byed do //
T09D4153:201b-6: gang gi skye bo lci ba'i bka' //
T09D4153:201b-7: nam zhig gzhon nus 'da' byed dam //
T09D4153:201b-8: rin chen 'byung gnas dus rlabs kyis //
T09D4153:201b-13: gzhon nu gnyen gyi spyod yul du 'dug pa 'di rnams song ngam /
T09D4153:201b-14: kun ta nas ma song ste 'di bzhin 'jug pa
T09D4153:201b-15: gzhon nu la smra ba ni lha mo 'od kyi
T09D4153:201b-17: bdag la 'phags pa'i goo ta ma'i nye 'khor ltos
T09D4153:201b-18: la 'phags pa goo ta ma la smros shig /
T09D4153:201b-19: de yang 'di bzhin du grogs pos byas pa la
T09D4153:201b-20: chags pa yin gyis zhes zer ro //
T09D4153:201b-22: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs te /
T09D4153:201b-23: thams cad kyang rang gi gar rtse bar byed cing gnyis po yang gar byed do //
T09D4153:201b-24: lo ma can nges par bltas nas /
T09D4153:201b-25: kye de bzhin yin na 'dir 'phags pa goota mas
T09D4153:201b-26: legs ldan ma'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro zhing de
T09D4153:201b-28: de nas lha mo 'di dag bdag cag gis smrar
T09D4153:201b-29: deng ngo zhes de dag song ste rab tu zhugs
T09D4153:201b-30: so // de nas rtsed grogs bzhad gad pa rab tu zhugs so //
T09D4153:201b-31: na mnyam dga' ba thub pa'i skye bo'i rjes su
T09D4153:201b-32: 'jug cing yang dag par spyod pa la lha mo
T09D4153:201b-34: bdag cag gi snying la zug rdur gnas te /
T09D4153:201b-35: de'i ri mor bris pa la yang bag ma'i ltad mo 'di smra zhing /
T09D4153:201b-37: 'dir bltas nas slar yang ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur
T09D4153:201b-38: ba de lta de ltar 'dir yang de'i blo rnam
T09D4153:201b-40: gal te 'jig rten pha rol du //
T09D4153:201b-41: bdag cag 'das par gyur na yang //
T09D4153:201b-42: rigs rgyud rnam par chad gyur nas //
T09D4153:201b-43: mtshun la chu bzhin rnam par 'chad //
T09D4153:201b-45: nyams dga' ba'i bya ba 'grub par 'gyur snyam nas nges par bltas pa nas //
T09D4153:201b-46: der mnyam dga' ba'i sngar 'jug pa manydzu rab tu dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal nas 'thon byung ngo //
T09D4153:201b-47: re zhig 'di la dri'i snyam ste /
T09D4153:201b-48: kye manydzu la na mnyam dga' ba gang na yod /
T09D4153:202a-2: de 'di na rab tu dga' ba'o //
T09D4153:202a-4: der nye bar 'gro bar bya'o zhes rab tu zhugs
T09D4153:202a-5: nas bltas pa na gang zhig sbrang rtsi byed pa'i
T09D4153:202a-6: gshog pa'i rlung gis rab tu bskyod na me tog
T09D4153:202a-7: rnams ni kha bye ze 'bru'i rdul du 'khrigs shing
T09D4153:202a-8: gdong na bung ba rnams ni dzham sgrogs shing 'khor
T09D4153:202a-9: bas 'khrigs so // na mnyam dga' ba ma mthong nas /
T09D4153:202a-10: manydzu las 'di na bzhugs zer te /
T09D4153:202a-11: gal te gdug pa can gyi rig 'dzin mas 'di nas brkus te /
T09D4153:202a-12: khyer ba ma yin nam zhes smras pa na /
T09D4153:202a-13: rig 'dzin ma rab tu zhugs te /
T09D4153:202a-15: ji srid bdag cag gis dga' ba'i grogs mo la /
T09D4153:202a-16: gzhon nu'i tshul 'di nye bar smras gyur pa //
T09D4153:202a-17: de nas dga' grogs padma ba t'i la //
T09D4153:202a-18: mgo la zug rngu yang dag skyes par gyur //
T09D4153:202a-19: lus ni nyal ba tsam thob pa ma yin pa shin tu gdung ba 'phel bar gyur te /
T09D4153:202a-20: grogs mo'i skye bo yang shin tu gdung bar byed do //
T09D4153:202a-21: skabs der dga' ba'i grogs mo spangs te /
T09D4153:202a-22: 'ongs kyang ma 'ongs pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
T09D4153:202a-23: gzhon nu'i thugs kyang shin tu gdung bar byas so snyam nas /
T09D4153:202a-24: lta zhing gzhon nu'i na mnyam mthun pa de bltas
T09D4153:202a-25: nas re zhig bar du 'di gang du 'gro blta
T09D4153:202a-27: bzhad gad pas bltas te 'di na re zhig rtsed
T09D4153:202a-28: mo'i ri'i steng na chu'i 'khrul 'khor steng du 'bab
T09D4153:202a-29: cing rab tu g-yo ba dba' rlabs dzha ri'i sgra
T09D4153:202a-30: 'byin pa'i steng na na mnyam mthun pa blta bar
T09D4153:202a-31: bya'o zhes steng du phyin te /
T09D4153:202a-32: gar byed cing h'i h'i bho zhes so //
T09D4153:202a-33: de nas mya ngan med pa'i tshal gyi rin chen
T09D4153:202a-34: rdo leb yangs pa'i steng na cung zad smra bar
T09D4153:202a-35: byed cing bzhugs nas mchis so //
T09D4153:202a-37: rig 'dzin ma ni 'dir re zhig gzhon nu dag
T09D4153:202a-38: yid ches pa'i gtam gang yin mnyam par bya'o snyam
T09D4153:202a-39: mo // de nas rab tu zhugs pa na 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo //
T09D4153:202a-40: shugs nar phyung ste kye ma 'jig rten rnams ni yul la mngon par zhen par 'gyur te /
T09D4153:202a-41: gang des phyin cing 'gro ba gang zhig lan brgyar skyes gyur pa //
T09D4153:202a-42: bde ba gang de lan cig ma yin mngon du ma gyur med //
T09D4153:202a-43: dpal mo gang der mdzes pa'i rda ma g-yo zhing dgod pa ltar //
T09D4153:202a-44: gang zhig ma thob med cing slar yang de la de bzhin chags //
T09D4153:202a-45: bzhad gad nye bar mnyen te khyod kyi bde legs
T09D4153:202a-46: 'phel gyur cig /'dren pa ni de bzhin du shlo
T09D4153:202b-0: @202b ka de nyid klog par byed de /
T09D4153:202b-1: rig 'dzin ma ni rnga brdung zhing grogs dga' ma la mtshun gyi chu 'byin no zhes so //
T09D4153:202b-3: kye bram ze shis par brjod pa'i lan gnang bar mdzod zer /
T09D4153:202b-4: 'dren pa ji ltar goo ta ma'am //
T09D4153:202b-6: 'dir zhugs shig / bzhad gad pas rang nyid bsams te /
T09D4153:202b-7: ji srid du yang na mnyam mthun pa ci zer
T09D4153:202b-8: nyan zhing brtags pan shin tu lci zhing de yang
T09D4153:202b-10: de nas re zhig /'di ltar lha mo'i skyes smra ba'i skabs ma rnyed do //
T09D4153:202b-11: de bzhin re zhig smra'o snyam nas gsal bar /
T09D4153:202b-12: kye na mnyam dga' ba gzigs gzigs //
T09D4153:202b-13: 'di ltar thang shing ljon pa'i dra ba yi //
T09D4153:202b-14: bu ga las byung padma'i 'dab mar ni //
T09D4153:202b-15: sbrang rtsis myos pa'i bung bas glu len cing //
T09D4153:202b-16: padma'i steng na chu rgyun rab tu 'bab //
T09D4153:202b-19: bdag cag la rjes su brtse bar mdzad do snyam mo //
T09D4153:202b-22: kun kyang bye zhing rgyas ldan pa //
T09D4153:202b-23: ge sar nges par ltung ba yis //
T09D4153:202b-24: 'gro rnams gnas shing mi rtag pa //
T09D4153:202b-25: ji ltar 'di yis gsal bor smras //
T09D4153:202b-26: rig 'dzin ma ni ji ltar gsung ba thos nas bdag nyid shin tu gdung bar byed do //
T09D4153:202b-27: bzhad gad pas rang nyid bsams te gzhan gang yin smra'o snyam ste /
T09D4153:202b-28: rab tu gsal bar kye gzhan yang 'di lta ste /
T09D4153:202b-29: sbrang rtsi bsten zhing chu'i 'khor rab g-yo las //
T09D4153:202b-30: chu 'dzin lho nas chu rgyun dbus su rnam 'bab pa //
T09D4153:202b-31: mthong nas rma bya mdongs rnams rab brkyong gar byed pa //
T09D4153:202b-32: na mnyam dga' ba chu rgyun do shal rnams la gzigs //
T09D4153:202b-34: na mnyam chu rgyun khang pa 'di nyid gcig pu'am //
T09D4153:202b-35: mngon 'dzin dngos po'i rgyu rnams ni //
T09D4153:202b-36: skad cig skad cig mngon par 'jig / glu byang rgyun gyi khang pa bzhin //
T09D4153:202b-37: 'gro ba thams cad de bzhin 'jug / rig 'dzin ma ni snying brtan par byas la /
T09D4153:202b-38: gzhan yang mnyan par bya'o snyam mo //
T09D4153:202b-39: bzhad gad pa bdag gi gnas la rnam par bsams te /
T09D4153:202b-40: gdung ba sreg pa'i mya ngan grol nus rnams //
T09D4153:202b-41: blangs te gang dang gang ni 'dir smras kyang //
T09D4153:202b-42: sbyin sreg mar rgyun 'bab bzhin de dang de //
T09D4153:202b-43: lhag par shin tu yongs su 'bar bar byed //
T09D4153:202b-44: de bas 'dir dgon pa stong par du bar bya'o snyam mo //
T09D4153:203a-0: @203a * // de nas mngag gzhug ma rab tu zhugs nas /
T09D4153:203a-1: lha mo 'od kyi blo gros mas /
T09D4153:203a-2: bdag la bka' bsgos te bag ma'i bkra shis kyi
T09D4153:203a-3: dra ba 'di gzhon nu la khyer te 'ongs so
T09D4153:203a-4: // gzhon nu ni de nas yongs su 'chag cing mchis so //
T09D4153:203a-5: drung du phyin te nye bar btud nas phyag byas
T09D4153:203a-6: te gzhon nu rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur
T09D4153:203a-7: cig / lha mo'i bkas bkra shis kyi dra ba
T09D4153:203a-8: 'di blo dang ldan pa khyod kyis nges par byin
T09D4153:203a-9: cig ces so // rig 'dzin ma ni mi bzod par gyur /
T09D4153:203a-10: aa ae 'dir gang bag mar byas sam snyam mo //
T09D4153:203a-11: de bzhad gad pas bzung ste /
T09D4153:203a-13: mngag gzhug ma shin tu dga' ste /
T09D4153:203a-14: ae ma lha mo mngon par 'dod pa yid kyi shing rta shin tu yang nges so zer nas /
T09D4153:203a-15: yongs su zhugs nas song ngo //
T09D4153:203a-17: na mnyam skabs med par 'di bzhin bkra shis kyi
T09D4153:203a-18: dra ba bskur ba ci zhig / bzhad gar mnas
T09D4153:203a-19: de sems so // 'dren pas yang dris pa na /
T09D4153:203a-21: bdag gi tshig gang zhig yal bar mi 'dor na smra'o //
T09D4153:203a-26: rig 'dzin ma ni sdug bsngal te /
T09D4153:203a-27: ae ma dga' ba'i grogs mo'i lus rdzogs pa ni /
T09D4153:203a-30: de dag gi sems la bltas nas /
T09D4153:203a-31: ci ste bdag yongs su len pa yin nam /
T09D4153:203a-35: 'di bzhin byed pa ji ltar bzhad gad pa nas /
T09D4153:203a-36: 'di bkra shis dra ba la dris /
T09D4153:203a-38: na mnyam yongs su len pa zhes bya ba ni sman med pa'i nad yin /
T09D4153:203a-40: gti mug skye mched 'dzin pa zhi ba 'thor zhing phyir log sgrub par byed //
T09D4153:203a-41: rnam g-yo'i yid 'ong myos pa'i gnas dang bsam gtan gyis ni gdug pa'i dgra //
T09D4153:203a-42: sdug bsngal 'byung gnas bde ba 'joms byed sdig pa'i rang bzhin gnas yin te //
T09D4153:203a-43: yongs 'dzin gdong bzhin blo ldan rnams kyang nyon mongs dang ni nyams par byed //
T09D4153:203a-44: rig 'dzin mdu [*ma ngu?] zhing gzhan ci zhig lta snyam mo //
T09D4153:203a-45: 'dren pa nas gzhan yang na mnyam //
T09D4153:203a-46: yongs su 'dzin pa byas gyur kyang //
T09D4153:203a-47: bdag ni nags su 'gro bar byed //
T09D4153:203a-48: de nas skye bo gzhan rnams kyang //
T09D4153:203a-49: yongs su sdug bsngal ci zhig bya //
T09D4153:203a-50: rig 'dzin ma ni dga' ba'i grogs mo gzhon nu'i rjes su 'di bzhin 'jug na /
T09D4153:203b-2: kye ji ltar 'di bzhin der ni 'jigs bcas 'bab //
T09D4153:203b-3: mi dbang gtsug ni 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba yis //
T09D4153:203b-4: zhabs la btud dang rgyal po'i phun tshogs yongs spangs nas //
T09D4153:203b-5: khyod ni nags na gnas pa ci'i phyir rab tu bsngags //
T09D4153:203b-6: 'dren pa nas rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas las gzhan gang zhig kyang mchis sam gzigs mdzod /
T09D4153:203b-7: ji ltar der ni dga' 'gyur rab dga'i sa gzhi rnams dang ni //
T09D4153:203b-8: mtho ris gang g'a rnams kyi skyed pas byang sa gor ma'i steng //
T09D4153:203b-9: gang zhig dga' zhing dga' ba'i ri dags tshogs rnams bsnyen bkur zhing //
T09D4153:203b-10: grogs nges nags kyi nang du gnas gyur pa ni skal ba bzang //
T09D4153:203b-12: spong ba'i brag ri skye bos dben zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas bzang na //
T09D4153:203b-13: phug yangs ri dags rnams kyi spyod yul nags kyi ri mos yongs su bskor //
T09D4153:203b-14: so ga'i dus ni bung ba rnams ni rnga sgra snyan par rab sgrogs shing //
T09D4153:203b-15: lam zhugs nyon mongs me yang bdag cag rnams la 'byung mi 'gyur zhes sgrogs //
T09D4153:203b-16: rig 'dzin ma ni kye ma shin tu lci mo zhig smras so snyam mo //
T09D4153:203b-18: kye snying rje med pa ji ltar gnyen 'dun gyi
T09D4153:203b-19: skye bo rnams la mnyes gshin pa'ang khyod la mi
T09D4153:203b-21: 'jig rten gyi gnyen la de bzhin du mnyes gshin pa ni /
T09D4153:203b-23: 'jig rten thams cad mar me bzhin //
T09D4153:203b-24: skad cig skad cig gis skye zhing //
T09D4153:203b-26: skye ba med dag mya ngan 'da' //
T09D4153:203b-27: gzhan yang na mnyam mnyes gshin pa'i //
T09D4153:203b-28: rtsa bar mi shes pa las te //
T09D4153:203b-29: mi shes rdul gyis g-yogs gyur pa'i //
T09D4153:203b-30: sngon las sa bon ma zad las //
T09D4153:203b-31: sred pa'i chu yis dbang bsgyur nas //
T09D4153:203b-32: skye ba'i myu gu skye bar 'gyur //
T09D4153:203b-34: nye bar dul ba 'di 'dra ba ni /
T09D4153:203b-35: thub pa'i skye bo la yang ga la snyam mo //
T09D4153:203b-37: gang yang 'dir re zhig 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi
T09D4153:203b-38: rjes su yang 'jug par mdzod cig /'dren pa nas
T09D4153:203b-39: / 'jig rten gyi chos gang yin bzhad gad pa nas /
T09D4153:203b-40: yul gyi rjes su mngon par dga'o //
T09D4153:203b-42: yul gyis chog chog gzigs mdzod /
T09D4153:203b-43: yul ni dug bzhin zos tsam nyid na mngar ldan cing //
T09D4153:203b-44: rnam par smin pha rab tu tsha ba dug bzhin yul //
T09D4153:204a-1: bsrung bar mi nus rab g-yo'i shugs //
T09D4153:204a-2: shin tu rmongs byed mun pa stug po dug bzhin yul //
T09D4153:204a-3: yang na 'dod pa'i dug dang dug ni gzhal zhig brtags gyur na //
T09D4153:204a-4: rang bzhin mi mtshungs yul las dug ni mchog yin te /
T09D4153:204a-5: dug gis skye ba gcig nyid dug tu rab 'gro zhing //
T09D4153:204a-6: skye ba dpag med du yang yul dug rab tu 'gro //
T09D4153:204a-8: kye re zhig bu'i gdong mthong bar mdzod dang /
T09D4153:204a-9: de nas nags su lhan cig tu 'gro bar bya'o //
T09D4153:204a-12: dper na bya ba 'di ni spang du di ring phyin nas shol byed pa //
T09D4153:204a-13: de 'dir skad cig yud tsam 'das gyur skye bo rtog byed de //
T09D4153:204a-14: mi bzad gshin rje khros pa dgod cing yongs su rtog pa'i //
T09D4153:204a-15: zur gyis blta bas be con mdangs kyang rab tu dmar bar byed /
T09D4153:204a-16: rig 'dzin ma ni ngu zhing kye ma grogs mo dga' ma /
T09D4153:204a-17: bdag gis 'di bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol du
T09D4153:204a-18: yang khyod kyi sngon du 'gro zhing lam bstan par
T09D4153:204a-21: kye 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad spang ba ni snying rje ba yang med dam /
T09D4153:204a-23: bdag gis rang gi lus kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do //
T09D4153:204a-24: bzhad gad pa nas ci'i phyir gtong //
T09D4153:204a-28: de khyod bdag gi bya ba btang nas /
T09D4153:204a-29: ci ste gzhan gyi bya ba la bdag nyid la sdug bsngal byed //
T09D4153:204a-31: dman pa bdag nyid ma shes pa dud 'gro rnams
T09D4153:204a-32: kyang gnas dang zas skom rang byung spyod cing rnyed
T09D4153:204a-33: par sla // gang zhig 'dod rnyed shin tu skom tshe chu rnams kyang ni 'thung bar byed //
T09D4153:204a-34: gang zhig gzhan phan don du brtson 'grus rtsom byed skyes bu de yi ni //
T09D4153:204a-35: rang gi gzi brjid kyis ni bde byed 'di ni skyes bu chen po'o //
T09D4153:204a-36: rig 'dzin ma ni snying gi dbugs phyung ngo //
T09D4153:204a-38: srog thag ran gyis bcings pa'i mtshan nyid grol lo snyam mo //
T09D4153:204a-40: kye ci'i phyir bu khyod gzhan don sgrub par byed /
T09D4153:204a-42: gzhan don gyi ri mo mngon par mi shes pa gzigs mdzod //
T09D4153:204a-43: gang zhig ngal med rta mgyogs kyis bgrod nyi mas snang bar byed //
T09D4153:204a-44: gang zhig khur grangs med par nor ldan rtag tu 'jig rten 'dzin //
T09D4153:204a-45: de ni nam yang rang don ma yin de yi rang bzhin nyid //

T09D4153:204b-2: kye de bzhin du khyod ni bdag gi ma yin
T09D4153:204b-3: bram ze'i don nam gzhan gyi don lhag pa zhig
T09D4153:204b-5: 'dren pa nas snying rje yun ring du ma reg pa yin no //
T09D4153:204b-6: bdag mtshon skye bo nang du gdung bas bsreg ldan pa //
T09D4153:204b-7: gnyen bshes 'jig rten sdug bsngal gnas pa ci phyir bde //
T09D4153:204b-8: 'jig rten kun gyi sdug bsngal bdag gi lus kyis khur //
T09D4153:204b-9: dam pa mnar med gnas pa yang ni spro bar byed //
T09D4153:204b-10: rig 'dzin ma ni mngon 'dod kyi skabs rnyed do snyam mo //
T09D4153:204b-12: kye 'jig rten thams cad de bzhin du khyod kyi gnyen yin nam /

T09D4153:204b-18: 'jig rten 'di rnams sngon nas gnyen pa shes tshogs //
T09D4153:204b-20: kye ma 'di'i thugs ni shin tu rgya che'o snyam mo //
T09D4153:204b-22: gnyen 'dun 'jig rten rnams kyi don mdzad pa la
T09D4153:204b-23: de las ci'i phyir ring du sdod par byed ces
T09D4153:204b-24: zer ro // rig 'dzin ma ni legs par smras so snyam mo //

T09D4153:204b-27: don bya bar smra ba ni gang /
T09D4153:204b-29: lus la sogs pa cung zad slong ba'o //
T09D4153:204b-31: don bya ba'i skye bo rnams kyi nang nas lhag par che ba gang yin //
T09D4153:204b-33: legs par dris so snyam mo //
T09D4153:204b-35: gang zhig sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba'i skyabs gnas so //
T09D4153:204b-36: rig 'dzin ma ni shin tu dga' nas 'dir mngon par 'dod pa'i skabs rnyed do snyam nas /
T09D4153:204b-37: 'tsher bzhin du nye bar btud de /
T09D4153:204b-39: ngu bzhin du bdag ni shin tu mnar bar gyur pas skyabs gnas so //
T09D4153:204b-40: mthu chen po bdag ni skal ba dman te rjes
T09D4153:204b-41: su brtse bar mdzod cig 'dren pa ni shin tu

T09D4153:204b-44: 'gro rnams don grub mtshan du nye bar bcings //
T09D4153:204b-45: ma 'jigs ma 'jigs mi dkar mig can ma //
T09D4153:204b-46: di ring ci sgrub bdag la myur du smros //
T09D4153:204b-47: bzhad gad pa ni ya mtshan du gyur nas //
T09D4153:205a-0: ae ma gzugs bzangs rab tu mdzes pa rgyang pa 'di @205a * //

T09D4153:205a-8: de re zhig smrar chug snyam mo //

T09D4153:205b-1: rol ba'i ri bo'i zhol nyid du //

T09D4153:205b-6: ci yang ma mchis so zhes gnyis po gar byed
T09D4153:205b-7: cing nam mkha' la song ngo //
T09D4153:205b-9: khyed cag rab tu zhugs te /

T09D4153:205b-16: bzung nas yongs su zhugs so //

T09D4153:205b-38: / rig 'dzin ma rnam par gnod cing /
T09D4153:205b-39: aa ho bram ze 'di ni mtshan nyid yin no //
T09D4153:205b-40: 'dren pas gzigs nas 'di ni nges par skar ma rnams so //
T09D4153:205b-42: skar ma la 'di 'dra ba'i tshad gang la yin //
T09D4153:206a-1: ni 'di bzhin du rgya chen po'i tshad dang ldan no //
T09D4153:206a-3: sa'i mthil nas chu ngur mtshon pa ji ltar yin /
T09D4153:206a-5: de yang ring po nas shin tu phra zhing /
T09D4153:206a-8: yang mi ltung bar 'jug pa ji ltar yin /
T09D4153:206a-10: bdag cag shin tu mthon por gnas kyang mi ltung ba bzhin no //
T09D4153:206a-12: yang 'di nyin par mi mthong ba ji ltar yin /
T09D4153:206a-14: nye bar btud na nyin par kyang 'di bzhin mthong ngo //
T09D4153:206a-16: gzhon nus 'di rnams thams cad sngon gzigs pa snyam byed do //

T09D4153:206a-28: cing khrus la rab tu 'jug / drang srong bdun
T09D4153:206a-29: po 'di rnams ni phyag bya ba'i 'os so zhes
T09D4153:206a-30: thams cad kyis phyag byas so //
T09D4153:206a-32: 'jig rten kun gyi phan mdzad phyir //
T09D4153:206a-33: gzhan yang gtsug gi rin chen ltar //
T09D4153:206a-34: bud med rin chen rin chen bu //
T09D4153:206a-35: mtshungs pa yang dag thob gyur cig / rig 'dzin ma shin tu dga' ste /
T09D4153:206a-36: 'di rnams ma rmongs pa'i tshig gis ji lta ba bzhin du mchog sbyin no snyam mo //
T09D4153:206a-38: kye na mnyam 'di yis mkha' la 'gro ba'i stebs [?] kyis bdag cag yongs su phyin te //
T09D4153:206a-39: de nas 'dir nam mkha'i gang g'a la yud tsam cig ngal bso cig zer ro //

T09D4153:206b-0: // / @206b de nas sprang gi bu mo rab tu zhugs te /

T09D4153:214a-5: rgyal po ni legs ldan nor 'dzin ma la mchod yon phul nas /

T09D4153:214a-7: bdag gi sbyin gnas rjes bzung skye bo rnams la 'byung ma gyur //
T09D4153:214a-8: 'dir ni skye bo'i mngon par 'dod rnams rab tu rdzogs bya'i phyir //
T09D4153:214a-9: gal te skye bo 'di rnams nyes na'ang bdag gi mngon 'dod cha //
T09D4153:214a-10: mkhan po ni gus pa dang bcas nas sbyin sreg byed //
T09D4153:214a-11: aindra a'a gatstsha ha re a'a gatstsha me me dha
T09D4153:214a-12: ti the me she bri sha n'am pa shya me
T09D4153:214a-14: me'i thab khung la bltas nas 'jigs pas phyir 'phar ro //
T09D4153:214a-15: bzhad gad pa shin tu 'jigs nas kye na mnyam ltos ltos /
T09D4153:214a-16: 'di ni 'jigs shing kha yi sgo nas mche ba rab tu gtsigs //
T09D4153:214a-17: mig ni nyin byed gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra zhing rab tu dmar //
T09D4153:214a-18: shin tu 'jigs chen gad rgyangs nges par rab tu sgrogs //
T09D4153:214a-19: 'dir ni sbyin sreg thab khung gyes nas yang dag byung bar gyur //
T09D4153:214a-20: de nas srin po rab tu zhugs so //
T09D4153:214a-21: aa ho hu ta ma ho da ta h'um zhes gar byed cing //
T09D4153:214a-22: 'byung bzhi 'di rnams gom pa'i stobs kyis rab 'jig cing //
T09D4153:214a-23: bar snang 'di rnams 'od zer mngon par 'bar bar bya //
T09D4153:214a-24: phyogs kyi 'khor lo lag pa rab brkyang sdud byed cing //
T09D4153:214a-25: 'gro ba ma lus bdag gis rnam par g-yo bar bya //
T09D4153:214a-28: dge ba byed pa la bgegs mang ngo zhes brjod pa 'di bden par 'dug go zhes gsungs so //
T09D4153:214a-29: padma can ni shin tu 'jigs nas byis ba'i gdong
T09D4153:214a-30: la gos kyis bkab ste rgyal po'i rgyab tu 'ongs
T09D4153:214a-32: kye sems can chen po dgos pa ci'i ched du 'dir 'ongs /
T09D4153:214a-34: khyod kyis thams cad rab tu 'jug pa'i tshul khang
T09D4153:214a-35: pa chen po byas nas dgos pa ci'i ched du
T09D4153:214a-37: rgyal po ni shin tu mnyes nas gal te khyod kyis slong du 'ongs sam /
T09D4153:214a-38: ci slong ba smros shig / srin po nas /
T09D4153:214a-40: bzhad gad pa 'dren pa'i rgyab tu shin tu 'jigs
T09D4153:214a-41: nas 'ongs te tshul gyi khang par zas la song
T09D4153:214b-0: bdag gi @214b zas ni gzhan yin nam /
T09D4153:214b-1: rgyal po nas smros shig / srin po nas /
T09D4153:214b-2: sha ni mdangs ldan slar yang ral gri'i lo mas sngon nyid du //
T09D4153:214b-3: rnam bcad rab tu mang po dron po mdog ni dmar po rnams //
T09D4153:214b-4: mi yi dbang po srin po rnams kyi bza' ba de rnams yin //
T09D4153:214b-5: mi yi bza' ba'i rigs rnams bdag la nges par ci zhig bya //
T09D4153:214b-6: rgyal po shin tu mnyes nas /
T09D4153:214b-7: tshur shog mkhas pa yid kyi shing rta rdzogs par bya //
T09D4153:214b-8: tshur shog bza' ba ji ltar 'dod bzhin lus 'di ni //
T09D4153:214b-9: pha rol don phyir bdag gis 'di ni nye bar bsrungs //
T09D4153:214b-10: sha rnams bcad pas bdag ni yun ring 'bras bcas 'gyur //
T09D4153:214b-11: padma can du zhing rje'i sras khyod kyi di ring tshul lugs 'di ci zhig / rgyal po nas /
T09D4153:214b-12: lha mo skyes pa de'i 'bras bu dang bcas so //
T09D4153:214b-14: kye na mnyam ji ltar gcig gi don gyi phyir 'jig rten 'di rnams yongs su gtong ngam /
T09D4153:214b-16: bdag ni de bzhin gang du yang //
T09D4153:214b-18: de yi phyir na skye bo 'di //
T09D4153:214b-19: zug rdu zhi phyir bdag nyid gtong //
T09D4153:214b-21: bdag ni de lta bu'i mchod sbyin gyi cho ga 'di mi byed do //
T09D4153:214b-22: 'dir ni phyugs gsod len pa'i phyir //
T09D4153:214b-23: bgegs ni nges par rnam par zhugs //
T09D4153:214b-24: 'di yi cho ga rig byed las //
T09D4153:214b-25: 'di la phyugs ni sbyin par bshad //
T09D4153:214b-27: gang zhig dgos 'dod bgegs yin na //
T09D4153:214b-28: bdag ni bgegs kyang mchog tu mos //
T09D4153:214b-29: gang la yid kyi shing rta 'grub //
T09D4153:214b-30: cho ga de bzhin drag tu zhog / slar yang /
T09D4153:214b-31: kye yi bram ze mchod sbyin la //
T09D4153:214b-32: srin po phyugs rnams ci phyir rung //
T09D4153:214b-33: yang na bdud rtsi spangs nas ni //
T09D4153:214b-34: snying po med pas ci zhig bya //
T09D4153:214b-36: bho khyod 'dir ci'i phyir gtam skom pos dus 'phrog par byed //
T09D4153:214b-38: bho 'dir mchog gi tshes grangs la /
T09D4153:214b-39: lus las ji ltar 'dod pa nye bar spyod cig
T09D4153:214b-40: padma can ni du zhing skal ba dman pa bdag
T09D4153:214b-41: gi lus 'di yang re zhig dang por nye bar
T09D4153:214b-42: bza' bar gyis shig / rgyal po nas /
T09D4153:214b-47: ai: mya ngan gyis 'jigs pa'i bag chags can 'dis ci zhig bya /
T09D4153:214b-50: mya ngan byas pa'i sha ni bska dang kha zhing tsha ba'i ngo rnams yang dag bro bar byed //
T09D4153:214b-51: chags pa can ni sla zhing khu bar byas bzhin rab tu skrag bcas de ni bskams pa 'dra //
T09D4153:215a-1: pa'i skyur zhing rab tu tsha dang rtsub rtsub brod med zos nas brang ni tsha bar byed //
T09D4153:215a-2: mchog tu byams pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi lus ni mngar zhing dbang po thams cad mchog tu tshim //
T09D4153:215a-3: rgyal po shin tu ma nyes nas /
T09D4153:215a-4: ring mo nas slong ba'i skye bo mngon shes can
T09D4153:215a-5: re zhig bdag gis mthong ngo zhes nas mtshon thogs
T09D4153:215a-6: te sha gcod par byas pa na /
T09D4153:215a-7: padma can ni lag pa nas bzung nas /
T09D4153:215a-8: rje'i sras ma bsams par ma byed cig ces smra zhing /
T09D4153:215a-9: kye sems can chen po 'phags pa'i bu yongs su thong la bdag longs shig zer /
T09D4153:215a-11: bho la kkha r'a ksha sa 'phags pa thong la bdag longs shig zer /
T09D4153:215a-13: bho sems can chen po grogs po thong la bdag zo cig zer /
T09D4153:215a-15: ma 'brel ba smra ba des chog chog / lha
T09D4153:215a-16: mo bdag gi chos kyi bgegs ma byed cig ces
T09D4153:215a-17: gsungs / padma can ni rmongs nas gar byed /
T09D4153:215a-18: bzhad gad pa ni gzhon nu'i gdong gos kyis g-yogs par byed do //
T09D4153:215a-20: bho sems can chen po gnas skabs 'dir bdag gi
T09D4153:215a-21: sha la nye bar sbyor bar gyis shig / srin
T09D4153:215a-22: po ni bdag nyid bsams te /
T09D4153:215a-23: 'di ltar khyod ni sems can chen po ste /
T09D4153:215a-24: bdag ni ma yin no snyam nas /
T09D4153:215a-25: nye bar za zhing gar byed do //
T09D4153:215a-26: rab tu gsal bar smras pa /
T09D4153:215a-27: aa ha ha 'dis shin tu ring por tshim par byas so //
T09D4153:215a-29: legs ldan 'jig rten skyong ba rnams yongs su bskyab par mdzod /
T09D4153:215a-31: bdag ni na mnyam dga' ba'i srog 'dor bar byed do //
T09D4153:215a-33: 'dir bsdad nas ci zhig bya zhes nas nges par song ngo //
T09D4153:215a-34: srin po ni de nas re zhig tshim mo //
T09D4153:215a-36: kye dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'di ni ji ltar 'dod
T09D4153:215a-37: pa bzhin du nye bar spyod cig ces lus gtad
T09D4153:215a-38: nas brgyal te gar byed do //
T09D4153:215a-42: sems can chen po yun ring por nyon mongs par mi rigs so snyam nas nges par song ngo //
T09D4153:215a-43: mi mngon tsam na zhugs nas /
T09D4153:215a-44: brgya byin gyi gzugs su bstan nas /
T09D4153:215a-45: kye rgyal po chen po nye bar bzhengs shig nye bar bzhengs shig / rgyal po nas /
T09D4153:215a-46: bdag ni rjes su bzung zhing rab tu dga' bas
T09D4153:215a-47: lus la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin nye bar longs
T09D4153:215a-48: spyod cig / brgya byin nas bdag ni srin po
T09D4153:215a-49: ma lags te / bdag ni brgya byin no //
T09D4153:215b-0: slar yang legs par 'ongs ba 'di gang zhig / bzhad @215b gdab nas /
T09D4153:215b-1: dbugs phyung shig / dbugs phyung shig / kye na
T09D4153:215b-2: mnyam dga' ba 'di ni nges par lha'i rgyal po
T09D4153:215b-4: lha bzhengs par mdzod cig / kye 'phags pa'i bu'i
T09D4153:215b-5: mdzad spyod 'di ni lha bas lhag par lha rnams
T09D4153:215b-7: padma can ni rgyal po la bltas nas ngu zhing 'phags pa'i bu 'di lta bu mthong nas /
T09D4153:215b-8: bdag gi lus ma nyams par gnas so snyam mo //
T09D4153:215b-10: kye lha'i rgyal po rab tu dgos pa ci'i phyir 'dir byon /
T09D4153:215b-12: khyod kyi bsam pa'i mthu mi g-yo ba la nor 'dzin dang /
T09D4153:215b-13: ri rab dag kyang g-yos te /
T09D4153:215b-16: ro ldan mthil nas mngon sum kun nas gsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'ongs te /
T09D4153:215b-17: rnam par spyod pa 'di ni bdag gi mig 'phrul ba yin no /
T09D4153:215b-20: gzhan yang ya mtshan che ba 'dir ni sprin gyi
T09D4153:215b-21: 'khor lo rlung drag pos bskyod pa ltar 'ur 'ur
T09D4153:215b-22: zhes rnam par bzlog par rtsom par byed do //
T09D4153:215b-24: kye ma 'jig rten rnams sdug bsngal gyis gdung bar byed dam zhes gsungs /
T09D4153:215b-27: bzhad gad pa nas gzigs gzigs /
T09D4153:215b-28: ston ka'i zla ba gang ba'i 'od ltar dkar zhing
T09D4153:215b-29: skar ma'i phreng ba'i do shal gyis nye bar brgyan
T09D4153:215b-31: rin po che'i 'od zer khyad par rab tu gsal
T09D4153:215b-32: ba nor rgyas kyi gdengs ka'i dkyil 'khor ltar dkar
T09D4153:215b-33: po yang dag par 'thon nas 'byung ngo //
T09D4153:215b-34: rgyal po ni shin tu ya mtshan che nas /
T09D4153:215b-36: 'dir gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
T09D4153:215b-38: kye bud med rin po che lha mo padma can
T09D4153:215b-39: gyi dbyibs lta bu zhig sa gzhi'i mthil nas yang
T09D4153:215b-40: dag par langs nas byung ngo //
T09D4153:215b-41: kye na mnyam dga' ba gzigs mdzod /
T09D4153:215b-42: rgyal po ni ya mtshan che nas /
T09D4153:215b-44: ro ldan mthil nas mngon sum du //
T09D4153:215b-45: 'dir ni dpal mo bzhengs sam ci //
T09D4153:215b-46: yang na 'di ni rnam gsal ba //
T09D4153:215b-47: sa chen lhag pa'i ska rags sam //
T09D4153:215b-48: de nas sa'i lha mo rab tu zhugs nas mchod yon phul te skyes bu chen po chur gshegs /
T09D4153:215b-51: kye khyod ni 'dir gsar du 'ongs pa ste /
T09D4153:215b-52: legs ldan grong 'jig dang gnyis po bdag gis mchod par bgyi'o //
T09D4153:215b-54: ji ltar bas sa rnam dag pas //
T09D4153:216a-2: de bzhin mchod pas tshim byas kyang //
T09D4153:216a-3: mchog tu dga' ba thob ma yin //
T09D4153:216a-5: khyod di ring de tsam slar yang rnam par g-yo ba ci'i phyir lags /
T09D4153:216a-6: sa nas khyod kyi sems pa rgya chen mthong bas rab dga' nas //
T09D4153:216a-7: chu gter ri bo nags tshal mthar thug mngon par bskyod //
T09D4153:216a-8: khyod kyi ltad mo ya mtshan ngo mtshar lta ba yis //
T09D4153:216a-9: rab dga'i khur gyis lus non dbang gis yongs su 'dar //
T09D4153:216a-10: de nas da ni bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis lus slar yang gsar par bya'o zhes /
T09D4153:216a-11: 'dren pa'i lus la yongs su byug pa byas so //
T09D4153:216a-12: bzhad gad pa shin tu dga' ste /
T09D4153:216a-13: na mnyam dga' ba ji lta ba de bzhin du mthong bar gyur to //
T09D4153:216a-15: legs ldan gyi chos kyi mthu'o //
T09D4153:216a-17: shin tu dka' ba spyad pa 'di'i las kyi tshul 'di ni cung zad las med do //
T09D4153:216a-18: sa nas lha'i dbang po 'di ni 'di la dga' ba med de gzigs mdzod //
T09D4153:216a-19: koo shi ka 'di yis sngon dus nas //
T09D4153:216a-20: 'di bzhin lus ni stong phrag smin par byas //
T09D4153:216a-21: sngon yang dri ma bsnyil bzhin spangs pa ni //
T09D4153:216a-22: bdag gi sa phyogs 'ga' yang de yod min //
T09D4153:216a-23: slar yang rgyal po mthong bas 'dir rmad du byung ngo //
T09D4153:216a-24: bdag ni 'gro bar byed do zhes nas song ngo //
T09D4153:216a-25: brgya byin nas rgyal po rang gi bsod nams bsags pa des //
T09D4153:216a-26: mtho ris su yang dag par gshegs par mdzod cig / rgyal po nas /
T09D4153:216a-27: de na slong mo ba yod dam ci byed brgya byin nas de med do //
T09D4153:216a-28: rgyal po nas gal te de bzhin yin na 'gro bar mi byed do //
T09D4153:216a-29: brgya byin nas der pha ma dag 'gro bar mos sam /
T09D4153:216a-30: lci ba dag ji ltar 'dod par ro //
T09D4153:216a-31: brgya byin nas de bzhin 'dir 'gro bar bya'o zhes nas yongs su song ngo ;
T09D4153:216a-32: / de nas ji ltar bu med pa'i legs ldan
T09D4153:216a-33: 'od zer zhes pa'i drang srong rab tu zhugs nas
T09D4153:216a-34: / aa ho rgyal po chen po'i bsam pa rab tu rgya che'o zhes rab tu zhugs te /
T09D4153:216a-35: kye rgyal po chen po bde legs su gyur cig / rgyal pos phyag byas nas /
T09D4153:216a-37: drang srong nas 'dir khyod kyi btsun mo dang bu'i ched du 'ongs so //
T09D4153:216a-38: padma can ni 'di ci zhig snyam mo //
T09D4153:216a-39: rgyal po ni shin tu dga' nas legs ldan bdag
T09D4153:216a-40: gi lus la sogs pa 'di slong ba kun gyi
T09D4153:216a-41: rang dbang ngo // de nas yol ba las ca co'i sgra'o //
T09D4153:216a-42: kye re zhig mchod sbyin gyi cho ga'i btsun mo gtong ba med /
T09D4153:216a-44: slong na sbyin par mi bya zhes//
T09D4153:216b-0: @216b 'di ni chos kyis cho gar med //
T09D4153:216b-2: phar zur bram ze gdug pa phar zur phar zur /
T09D4153:216b-3: rgyal po'i btsun mos khyod la ci zhig bya /
T09D4153:216b-5: rgyal po nas de skad ma zer cig / drang srong chen po bdag snying yang //
T09D4153:216b-6: ji ltar 'dod bzhin legs ldan long /
T09D4153:216b-8: bu mo padma pa t'i dang /
T09D4153:216b-9: bu padma autta ra tshur shog shig / khyed gnyis rgyal pos byin no //
T09D4153:216b-10: padma can du zhing rgyal po chen po bdag po ni yin mod kyi /
T09D4153:216b-11: 'on kyang rgyal po'i gdung rgyud 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T09D4153:216b-13: bdag ni mi sbyin zhes pa cung zad kyang med do zhes bshad zin to //
T09D4153:216b-14: padma can nas longs shig / de bzhin du du nas ci zhig bya /
T09D4153:216b-15: bu padma skyes tshur shog /'phags pa'i bus bdag cag yongs su btang zin gyis /
T09D4153:216b-16: yab la legs su ltos shig / phyi nas ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T09D4153:216b-17: padma skyes nas ci ste phyi nas bdag gis yab mthong bar mi byed /
T09D4153:216b-19: padma skyes gang gi phyir na /
T09D4153:216b-20: 'dis bdag cag yongs su btang gis gzhan du 'gro'o //
T09D4153:216b-25: yab kyang de bzhin du 'gro bar byed dam /
T09D4153:216b-27: padma skyes kyis don ni mi shes par shes nas bu yab la phyag 'tshol cig zer /
T09D4153:216b-28: padma skyes ni thal mo sbyar nas /
T09D4153:216b-29: yab bdag gi yum 'di tsam bshums pa ci ste /
T09D4153:216b-31: kye ma khyod ni snying rje med //
T09D4153:216b-32: gang zhig 'di bzhin tshe nge yis //
T09D4153:216b-33: bshums shing byis pa yongs su btang //
T09D4153:216b-34: h'a kye padma ba t'i dang /
T09D4153:216b-36: khyed cag gnyis po dag yin no //
T09D4153:216b-37: bram ze'i bu bdag cag kyang khyed cag gi rjes
T09D4153:216b-38: su 'gro bar bya'o zhes rmongs nas gar byed do
T09D4153:216b-39: // drang srong nas shog shog / bu mo bdag
T09D4153:216b-40: cag rnams 'gro bar bya ba ring por 'gro dgos
T09D4153:216b-41: // so // rgyal po ni padma skyes kyi spyi bo la bsnoms nas bshums shing /
T09D4153:216b-42: nags sam yang na grong khyer ram //
T09D4153:216b-43: ri bo dang ni rgya mtsho'ang rung //
T09D4153:216b-44: khyed cag nyal zhing gnyid log kyang //
T09D4153:216b-45: lha rnams kyis ni bsrung bar shog / lha mo khyod ni gar gnas der //
T09D4153:216b-46: gzhon nu 'di la rdeg ma byed //
T09D4153:216b-47: lha mo ni bsting tshig gis 'phags pa'i bu de bzhin du'ang mkhyen nam /
T09D4153:216b-49: khyed kyi srog ni yongs 'dor kyang //
T09D4153:216b-50: drang srong chen po'i bka' ma 'da' //
T09D4153:216b-51: me yi gzugs dang 'dra ba yi //
T09D4153:217a-2: bsod nams yongs su bsgrubs byas pas //
T09D4153:217a-4: drang srong nas bu mo longs shig / bdag cag 'gro bar bya'o //
T09D4153:217a-6: lha mo gshegs par mdzod cig / padma can ni phyag 'tshal te /
T09D4153:217a-7: rgyal rigs skye ba'i mthar thug par //
T09D4153:217a-8: bdag kyang de bzhin rjes 'jug shog / ces so //
T09D4153:217a-10: yab kyi nga la sngon ni rta sbyin zer nas ma byin pas nga khyod nga la nam ster /
T09D4153:217a-11: rgyal po ni bshums shing padma can la 'khyud nas
T09D4153:217a-12: bu de thub pa 'dis khyod la ster bar 'gyur
T09D4153:217a-18: rta'i sga 'di rnams tshags gyis shig ces zer /
T09D4153:217a-19: rgyal po rang nyid bsams pa na //
T09D4153:217a-20: skabs 'di bdag gi zug rngu ni //
T09D4153:217a-21: srog la bab kyang de bzhin min //
T09D4153:217a-22: ji ltar pha yi mnyes gshin pa'i //
T09D4153:217a-25: bu mo shog / bdag cag 'gro bar bya'o //
T09D4153:217a-26: padma can ni rgyal po la blta zhing /
T09D4153:217a-27: bu'i lag pa nas bzung nas song ngo //
T09D4153:217a-29: brtse ba'i zhags pas legs bsdams bzhin /
T09D4153:217a-30: gang gis bdag kyang shin tu gdung //
T09D4153:217a-31: na mnyam dbugs phyung shig dbugs phyung shig / bzhad
T09D4153:217a-32: gad pa brtabs bzhin du longs nas kye mi ster
T09D4153:217a-33: ci zhig zer / rgyal po rtab rtab po mdzad nas rnam par bsams pa /
T09D4153:217a-34: da ni bdag gi pha ma dag blta bar bya'o
T09D4153:217a-35: snyam pa na pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams rab
T09D4153:217a-36: tu zhugs nas ngo mtshar che ngo mtshar che /
T09D4153:217a-37: lha'i yab yum dag nam mkha' la bya ba mdzad pa gzigs mdzod /
T09D4153:217a-38: ngang pa'i gzhog pa'i cha yis bskyod bzhin rgyal mtshan phreng ba can //

T09D4153:223b-34: drang srong nas cis shes zer /
T09D4153:223b-36: gang zhig bden pa 'di dang snying rje'i bsam pa'i 'bras bu dang //
T09D4153:223b-37: de byin bdag la nam yang rjes su gdung ba med 'gyur na //
T09D4153:223b-38: de yis da ltar de bas nus mthu shin tu lhag gyur pa'i //
T09D4153:223b-39: 'gro la phan phyir bdag la gtsug gi nor bu 'byung bar shog / ces gsungs pa dang /
T09D4153:223b-40: glog 'khyug pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad rtab rtab por gar byed do //
T09D4153:223b-41: padma skyes kyang nye bar langs so //
T09D4153:223b-43: aa ho sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rnam par dag gyur te //
T09D4153:223b-44: nyi ma 'od zer stong phrag rnams ni 'phro zhing gsal ba ltar //
T09D4153:223b-45: slar yang mi yi bdag la gtsug gi nor bur 'khrungs gyur nas //
T09D4153:223b-46: gang gi mthu ni rab brkyad [?] dug gi mun pa mngon par bcom //
T09D4153:223b-47: padma skyes kyang da ni padma bzhin du rab tu
T09D4153:224a-0: 'dzum zhes zer nas thams cad rtab rtab phor @224a
T09D4153:224a-2: padma can ni rgyal po la lta zhing padma skyes
T09D4153:224a-3: la 'khyud nas slar yang bdag gi mig phye bar
T09D4153:224a-6: na mnyam dga' ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon du mdzad do //
T09D4153:224a-7: rin chen phreng ba ma nas /
T09D4153:224a-8: 'di 'dra ba ltar yod pa bdag cag rnams dga' mo yin no zhes zer ro //
T09D4153:224a-10: gzhon nu yab yum dag la phyag 'tshol cig zer /
T09D4153:224a-11: padma skyes ni thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal bar byed /
T09D4153:224a-12: rgyal po nas chos dang ldan par gyur cig ces gsungs /
T09D4153:224a-13: padma skyes nas yab ji lta bar gyur cig zer /
T09D4153:224a-15: lha mo dang gzhon nu yang 'dir bdag gis 'bul bas rgyal po bzhes par mdzod cig zer /
T09D4153:224a-17: khyed ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o //
T09D4153:224a-18: thams cad shin tu dga' nas gar byed do //
T09D4153:224a-19: drang srong nas 'di bzhin du byas pa khyed kyis bzod par mdzod cig zer /
T09D4153:224a-20: 'dren pa nas rjes su bzung ba la bzod pa'i yul gang la yin gsungs /
T09D4153:224a-22: khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyis skye dgu'i yid kyi
T09D4153:224a-23: shing rta rdzogs par shog / mya ngam thang la
T09D4153:224a-24: chu gter dang ni ri bo 'dzeg pa'i skas su
T09D4153:224a-25: shog / chu gter sgrol ba'i gzings dang mi bzad
T09D4153:224a-26: mun pa rnams kyi snang bar shog /'jigs chen skyabs
T09D4153:224a-27: gnas dang ni dbul po rnams kyi dpag bsam shing
T09D4153:224a-29: rgyal po nas 'di gang zhig / drang srong nas /
T09D4153:224a-30: 'di ni lha yi tshogs rnams mnyam du khyab 'jug dbang phyug tshangs pa dbang po zla ba sogs //
T09D4153:224a-31: lha rnams kun gyis mkha' yi khang bzangs gnas shing thams cad 'di bzhin nam mkha' khyab par gyur //
T09D4153:224a-32: chen po de rnams gang rnams kyi ni rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phel zhing ser po dkar po yis //
T09D4153:224a-33: phyogs rnams rab tu mdzes shing khyab pa rtsig logs ri mor bris pa bzhin du mdzad gyur to //
T09D4153:224a-34: khyed kyi yab yum dag kyang nam mkha'i bzhon pa
T09D4153:224a-35: la gnas nas bu dang bcas shing chung mar bcas
T09D4153:224a-36: pa shis pa shis pa brjod par bya'o //
T09D4153:224a-37: rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas phyag byas so //
T09D4153:224a-38: legs ldan ci zhig bsgrub par bya ba gsungs shig / drang srong nas /
T09D4153:224a-39: khyod ni med gyur mnga' ris sdug bsngal gnas //
T09D4153:224a-40: slar yang gshegs shing slar yang skyong bar mdzod //
T09D4153:224a-41: di rings ke'i grong khyer gshegs pa'i phyir //
T09D4153:224a-42: mkha' bzhon 'di yang dbang pos khyod la bsrings //
T09D4153:224b-1: gong ma rnams ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o //
T09D4153:224b-2: thams cad shin tu dga' zhing zhon nas gar byed do //
T09D4153:224b-3: yongs su zhugs pa na rgyal po nas /
T09D4153:224b-4: aa ho mkha'i bzhon pa ni shin tu mgyogs te /
T09D4153:224b-6: ngang ba'i gshog pa rnam par bskyod pas rgyu ba'i tshogs ltar chu 'dzin rnams ni ring por gyur//
T09D4153:224b-7: ri bo'i dbang po rnams ni glang chen dbang po myos bzhin mngon du phyogs nas rgyug cing 'ong //
T09D4153:224b-8: 'di ni dbang pos dkrigs shing 'khor lo bzhin du nam mkha'i mthil ni rnam par gcod par byed //
T09D4153:224b-9: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nye ba'i 'od zer tshogs pas bskor zhing byang gi phyogs su 'gro bar byed //
T09D4153:224b-11: 'di ni bzod dka' grong khyer skye bo gnas bcas khyod las ni //
T09D4153:224b-12: bdud ris dkrugs shing 'jig rten kun 'tsho blta zhing phyag byed do //
T09D4153:224b-13: 'di rnams kyang ni skye bo'i gnas bcas shin tu 'das byas nas //
T09D4153:224b-14: bdag nyid ji lta bzhin du grong khyer s'a ke ta nas so //
T09D4153:224b-15: slar yang khyod kyi dga' ba'i bya ba ci zhig
T09D4153:224b-16: yod pa smra bar gyis shig / rgyal po nas
T09D4153:224b-17: / 'di las kyang dga' bar bya ba ci zhig yod //
T09D4153:224b-18: lha mo padma ba t'i bu yi zhal dang dga' ba'i goo tam /
T09D4153:224b-19: bzhon zhing mkha' yi bzhon pa la gnas yab yum lha tshogs 'khor bcas mthong //
T09D4153:224b-20: dga' ba'i blon po sna chen dang ni skye bo'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa //
T09D4153:224b-21: rab tu zhi gyur gzhan ni ci zhig bsgrub par bya zhing bya ba ci //
T09D4153:224b-22: 'on kyang dga' bar bya ba yod de //
T09D4153:224b-23: 'gro rnams dam chos 'byung zhing rab tu sbyor ba'i
T09D4153:224b-24: ltad mo chen por shog / legs spyod yon tan
T09D4153:224b-25: rnams kyis 'chi bdag yid kyi shing rta 'bras med
T09D4153:224b-26: shog / thub pa'i skye bo'i gtam gyi 'brel tshogs
T09D4153:224b-27: zhi zhing bdud rtsi'i char rnams kyis //
T09D4153:224b-28: bsil zhing dge bas zla ba'i snang bas rab tu
T09D4153:224b-29: 'gro zhing don byed shog / gang zhig snyan ngag
T09D4153:224b-30: bden pa rnams kyis dus ring dga' byas shi l'u
T09D4153:224b-32: dus ring nas ni nor gyi khur thob ring nas skye bo'i sems ni rab tu dga' bar mdzad //
T09D4153:224b-33: slar yang bkur gnas mthong bar gyur nas dpal ldan chags pa dang bral zhes pas mdzad gyur pa //
T09D4153:224b-34: 'jig rten kun du dga' ba sna tshogs zlos gar
T09D4153:224b-35: 'di ni gar gyis gzhir thob par shog / ces
T09D4153:224b-36: smras nas thams cad nges par zhugs so //
T09D4153:224b-37: yan lag lnga pa rdzogs so /
T09D4153:225a-0: // / gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu'i skyes pa'i rabs zlos gar gyi bstan bcos 'jig rten @225a * //
T09D4153:225a-1: kun du dga' ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po tsandra go mis rab tu sbyar ba'o /
T09D4153:225a-3: // / dam pa rnams kyi tshul la brten nas pandi ta chen po k'i rti tsandra dang /
